quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, India will witness GDP growth of _________ in 2023-24, depending on the trajectory of economic and political developments globally.
options: 6.2%
6% to 6.5%
6% to 6.8%
6.9%
6% to 7%

quiz.text: Union Finance Minister has tabled the Economic Survey 2022-23 in the parliament. Economic Survey is prepared by which of the following departments of the Ministry of Finance?
options: Department of Expenditure
Department of Financial Services
Department of Public Enterprises
Department of Economic Affairs
Department of Revenue

quiz.text:
In May 2020, as a part of the Aatmanirbhar Bharat (ANB) package, the Government of India launched its flagship scheme Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to the scheme?

A.     The scheme has a total outlay of ₹20,050 crore.

B.      It is to be implemented over five years in coastal States/Union Territories.

C.      As per Union Budget 2023-24, Government has planned to launch a new sub-scheme of PMMSY with targeted investment of Rs 6,000 crore.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A only
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, the credit growth to the Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSME) sector is over ________, on average during Jan-Nov 2022.
options: 63.4%
15.5%
30.6%
24.8%
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, ________ of the borrowers who availed of the ECLGS were micro-enterprises, and more than half of these borrowers had an exposure of less than ₹10 lakh.
options: 83%
76%
91%
65%
58%

quiz.text: Economic Survey 2022-23 narrates six challenges faced by the Global Economy. Which of the following challenges is/are correctly mentioned?
options: Russian-Ukraine conflict
Global Stagflation
Slowdown in China
Policy rate hikes to curb inflation, which led to widening of CAD in net importing economies.
All of the above

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, India is the ________ economy in the world in PPP terms.
options: fourth-largest
second-largest
fifth-largest
third-largest
sixth-largest

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, Global growth is forecasted to slow from 3.2 per cent in 2022 to 2.7 per cent in 2023 as per _________ World Economic Outlook, October 2022.
options: IMF’s
World Bank’s
World Economic Forum’s
ADB’s
US AID’s

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, during the last six years of  implementation of Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana, farmers have paid a premium of ₹25,186 crore and received claims amounting to ___________(as of 31 October 2022).
options: Rs. 1.4 lakh crore
Rs. 1.2 lakh crore
Rs. 1.8 lakh crore
Rs. 1.5 lakh crore
Rs. 2.1 lakh crore

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, India is the ______ largest service exporter in the world.
options: 3rd
5th
7th
4th
8th

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, during 2021-22, agricultural exports reached an all-time high of ___________.
options: USD 75.6 billion
USD 60.4 billion
USD 55.8 billion
USD 50.2 billion
USD 45.7 billion

quiz.text: Under the PM Schools for Rising India scheme, there is a provision for setting up more than 14,500 PM SHRI Schools, over the period FY23 to ________.
options: FY30
FY25
FY24
FY26
None of the above

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, more than ________ people exited poverty between 2005-06 and 2019-21 according to the UN Multidimensional Poverty Index
options: 27 crore
19 crore
34 crore
41 crore
52 crore

quiz.text:
As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, approximately 21.9 crore (as of 4 January 2023) beneficiaries have been verified under the Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri – Jan Arogya Yojana. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to PM-JAY? 

A.       It is a Centrally Sponsored Scheme 

B.       The households included are based on the deprivation and occupational criteria of Socio-Economic Caste Census 2011 (SECC 2011).

C.        It covers up to 3 days of pre-hospitalization and 7 days post-hospitalization
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, the livestock sector grew at a CAGR of 7.9 per cent during 2014-15 to 2020- 21 (at constant prices), and its contribution to total agriculture GVA (at constant prices) has __________ to _________ in 2020-21.
options: increased; 30.1%
decreased; 3.1%
increased; 24.3%
decreased; 4.3%
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, private investment in agriculture has increased to ______ in 2020-21.
options: 9.6%
8.5%
7.0%
9.3%
6.8%

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, Social sector expenditure has increased to ___________ in FY23 (Budget Estimate) from Rs. 11.4 lakh crore in FY18.
options: Rs. 21.3 lakh crore
Rs. 19.4 lakh crore
Rs. 14.8 lakh crore
Rs. 13.6 lakh crore
Rs. 12.8 lakh crore

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, capital expenditure by the Centre has steadily increased from a long-term average of 1.7 per cent of GDP (FY09 to FY20) to what percentage level of GDP in FY22 (Provisional Estimates)?
options: 2.7%
2.9%
2.2%
2.5%
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, the Gross Non-Performing Assets (GNPA) ratio of SCBs has fallen to a seven-year low of _________ (as of Sep 2022).
options: 8.0
5.0
5.7
7.8
4.5

quiz.text: As mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23, India has declared the Net Zero Pledge to achieve net zero emissions goal by 2070. Article 4 of the Paris Agreement provides that each Party shall communicate or update its Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) every ______ years.
options: five
three
two
six
seven

quiz.text: As per the Economic Survey 2022-23, more than ________ street vendors have availed of a first loan of ₹10,000 under the PM SVANidhi Scheme, and of these, more than 6.9 lakh have availed a second loan of ₹20,000.
options: 12.7 lakh
22.7 lakh
32.7 lakh
17.7 lakh
26.7 lakh

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, the average monthly gross GST collection has increased from ₹0.90 lakh crore in FY18 to ________ lakh crore in FY23.
options: ₹1.26
₹1.38
₹1.45
₹1.49
₹1.54

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, during FY15 to FY23, about ________ have been realised as proceeds from disinvestment through 154 transactions using various modes/instruments.
options: ₹3.02 lakh crore
₹5.07 lakh crore
₹4.07 lakh crore
₹5.02 lakh crore
₹4.26 lakh crore

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, Union government has provided ________ year interest-free loans to state governments under the 'Scheme for Special Assistance to States for Capital Investment' for the last 3 years.
options: 25
50
20
40
60

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, Money Multiplier has remained stable at an average of 5.1%. Which of the following is the definition of ‘Money Multiplier’?
options: ratio of narrow money (M1) over the Reserve Money (M0)
ratio of Reserve money (M3) over the Broad Money (M0)
ratio of M2 over the Reserve Money (M0)
ratio of Broad money (M3) over the Reserve Money (M0)CRA
ratio of M4 over the Reserve Money (M0)

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, India meets _______ of its edible oils demand through imports, making it vulnerable to international movements in prices.
options: 50%
55%
45%
65%
60%

options: 2.1%
1.6%
2.2%
1.8%
2.4%

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, there are approximately 1.2 crore SHGs, comprising of _______ all women SHGs.
options: 78%
88%
85%
78%
91%

quiz.text: Economic Survey 2022-23 highlights the findings of the 2022 report of the UNDP on Multidimensional Poverty Index which says that _________ people exit poverty in India between 2005-06 and 2019-20.
options: 11.5 crore
41.5 crore
21.5 crore
31.5 crore
36.5 crore

quiz.text: eShram portal developed for creating a national database of unorganised workers, which is verified with Aadhaar. As per Economic Survey 2022-23, over _________ (as of December 2022) unorganised workers have been registered on eShram portal.
options: 18.5 crore
32.5 crore
16.5 crore
28.5 crore
36.5 crore

quiz.text:
As per Economic Survey 2022-23, around 32.1 crore persons have been enrolled cumulatively and about 1.1 Lakh claims have been paid under Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana.

Which of the following statement is incorrect with respect to the above scheme?
options: The premium applicable under the scheme is Rs. 12 per annum
Risk coverage of Rs. 2 lakh for accidental death and permanent total disability
Risk coverage of Rs. 1 lakh for permanent partial disability
The accident cover of the member shall terminate on attaining age 70 years
The policy will terminate on closure of account with the Bank

quiz.text:
As per Economic Survey 2022-23, Credit growth to the MSME sector was over 30.6% on average during Jan-Nov 2022, supported by the extended Emergency Credit Linked Guarantee Scheme (ECLGS). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ECLGS?

A.     Interest rate charged is capped at 9.25% for banks and 14% for NBFCs.

B.      Moratorium period on principal amount is 24 months.

C.      Schem’s nodal ministry is Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises.
options: A only
A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, which of the following tax head contributes the maximum percentage to India’s Gross Tax Revenue (GTR)?
options: Corporation Income Tax
Union Excise Duties
GST
Customs Tax
Personal Income Tax

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, Housing Price Index (HPI) represents the price changes in residential housing properties in ______ cities across 18 States which is compiled and published by National Housing Bank.
options: 40
100
25
50
65

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to data shared in Economic Survey 2022-23 on e-Shram portal?
options: Female registrations on e-Shram portal stood at 52.8%.
61.7% of total registrations belonged to the age group 18-40 years.
State-wise, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra, and Tamil Nadu accounted for nearly half of total registrations.
Agriculture sector workers contributed to 52.4% of the total registrations.
None of the above

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, as a result of the Jal Jeevan Mission, of the 19.4 crore rural households, ________ households are getting tap water supply in their homes.
options: 14 crore
16.5 crore
19 crore
13 crore
11 crore

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, due to Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana, the LPG coverage improved from 62% in 2016 to ________ in 2021.
options: 96.4%
98.9%
96.8%
89.1%
None of the above

quiz.text:
As per Economic Survey 2022-23, National Green Hydrogen Mission will enable India to be energy independent by 2047. Which of the following statements is/are the targets to be achieved by 2030 under this Mission?

A.     Development of Green Hydrogen Production capacity of at least 5 MMT per annum.

B.      Cumulative reduction in fossil fuel imports over Rs. 2 lakh crore.

C.      Abatement of nearly 50 MMT of annual greenhouse gas emissions.
options: Only A
Only B
Both A and B
Both A and C
All of the above

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, India ranks _________ globally with respect to the net gain in average annual forest area between 2010 and 2020.
options: 5th
2nd
7th
3rd
1st

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Agriculture and Allied sector data points as mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23?
options: During 2021-22, agricultural exports reached an all-time high of US$ 50.2 billion.
Private investment in agriculture increases to 9.3% in 2020-21.
Agriculture sector has grown at an average annual growth rate of 4.6% during the last 6 years.
India has the highest number of organic farmers in the world at 44.3 lakhs.
None of the above

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, Industrial sector contributed about _______ of the total gross value added in the country during FY12 and FY21 and employed over 12.1 crore people.
options: 28%
34%
30%
39%
41%

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Production Linked Incentive scheme as mentioned in the Economic Survey 2022-23?
options: PLI schemes has been introduced across 14 categories.
Scheme has an estimated capex of ₹7 lakh crore over the next five years.
Investment of ₹47,500 crores has been seen under the PLI schemes in the FY22.
Employment generation of 3.0 lakh have been recorded due to PLI schemes.
None of the above

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, India has become the ________ mobile phone manufacturer globally, with the production of handsets going up from 6 crore units in FY15 to 29 crore units in FY21.
options: largest
fourth-largest
third-largest
second-largest
fifth-largest

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, the services sector is expected to grow at _____ in FY23.
options: 9.1%
8.4%
10.3%
6.3%

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, external debt to GDP is at a level of _______ as of end-September 2022.
options: 15.7%
29.8%
19.2%
16.4%
32.6%

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, which of the following is the second largest major source of external financing for India?
options: Service export
Merchandise export
Commercial Borrowings
Remittances
None of the above

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, In-Principal Approval had been granted to 56 projects with total project cost of ₹57,870.1 crore under the__________ , from 2014-15 to 2022-23.
options: Viability Gap Funding (VGF) Scheme
IIPDF Scheme
National Infrastructure Pipeline
National Monetisation Pipeline
GatiShakti

quiz.text: Corpus fund titled India Infrastructure Project Development Fund (IIPDF) (mentioned in Economic Survey 2022-23) has been created by which of the following departments/organizations?
options: Department for Promotion of Industry & Internal Trade
Department of Economic Affairs
Confederation of Indian Industry
1 and 3

quiz.text: As per Economic Survey 2022-23, 1009 projects worth _______ have been completed under the National Infrastructure Pipeline.
options: Rs 2.5 lakh crore
Rs 3.5 lakh crore
